title: Ep. #91 | Catching Up: Ashley Choi
description:
Ashley Choi, host of DIVE Studio’s beloved ‘GET REAL with Peniel, BM, and Ashley Choi,’ stops by to chat with Eric about life before and after joining the K-pop industry. She dishes on her experience growing up in Queens, hanging out with the “Korean Korean” rebels in junior high, and landing the audition that would eventually lead to her future debut with Ladies’ Code. Tune in for an in-depth discussion with Ashley and some fun flashbacks to ‘HWAITING’!

This episode is brought to you by BetterHelp! Get 10% off your first month by visiting https://betterhelp.com/kpop

Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave a comment, rating and/or review on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Soundcloud, and YouTube.

Episodes are presented by @thedivestudios

Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at http://www.divestudios.io/daebakshow !

Special thanks to Ashley Choi!
